item.title: Sean "Diddy" Combs acquitted of sex trafficking, convicted on lesser charges
item.description: The verdict in the Sean "Diddy" Combs trial comes after the high-profile proceedings started in May.

item.title: Lululemon sues Costco, alleging the discount retailer copied its designs
item.description: Lululemon is accusing Costco of stealing from its "path-breaking" brand by selling dupes of its sweatshirts, jackets and pants.

item.title: New expedition will seek to locate Amelia Earhart's lost plane
item.description: An expedition to a remote and tiny island this fall will attempt to locate Amelia Earhart's planeâ€‹ in the Pacific Ocean.

item.title: Video shows airborne shark hitting surfer's face in Florida
item.description: Surfer Darren Kaye said he noticed the spinner shark before the collision, but thought nothing of it until the animal came flying at him.

item.title: Microsoft to lay off 4% of workforce in latest round of job cuts
item.description: The tech company is laying off roughly 9,000 workers in latest round of job cuts, after slashing 6,000 jobs in May.
